channel.title: Bjørn Erik Pedersen on iSight Pro
channel.description: Recent content in Bjørn Erik Pedersen on iSight Pro

item.title: Great for the office!
item.description: { .img-fluid .mb-5} Working at a desk in a traditional office setting, I enjoy using iSight to build upon the capabilities of my desktop computer; I can move virtual tabs all around the office, and working for long periods of time doesn’t fatigue my head thanks to the iSight’s lightweight frame.
